Common.Highlight.Common.Text: Zoning: Light Industrial
Easy Access to I-40/85 via Highway 119
Piedmont Triad International Airport (40 minutes)
Raleigh-Durham International Airport (35 minutes)
Electric: Duke Energy
Water/Sewer: City of Mebane
Gas: Public Service of NC

Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text: Located in Alamance County, Carolina Central Industrial Center (CCIC) is a 91 acre corporate park with over 700,000 square feet of existing space. CCIC is centrally located just off Interstate I-40/85 (Exit 153) between Greensboro (Piedmont Triad) and Raleigh (Research Triangle). This well maintained business park offers attractive landscaping, underground utilities, well-lighted streets and ample parking.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: 5.60 Acre site available for Built-to-Suit up to 70,000 SF. Site is level and graded. Paved parking already in place. Storm water drainage in place. Zoned light industrial. Park includes protective covenants.

Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text: The site offers convenient accessibility to all major Mid-Atlantic cities via I-40, I-73, I-85, and NC Highway 68. The PTI airport submarket is the center of the 1.8M population Piedmont Triad MSA, and is home to major corporations including: Volvo, HondaJet, Qorvo, Mack Trucks, FedEx, Amazon, BB&T, Bank of America, HAECO, Syngenta and numerous other international, national and regional corporations.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: CBRE is pleased to exclusively offer for sale or development Gallimore Industrial Center, a 70 acre, shovel ready industrial site located near Piedmont Triad International Airport (PTI) in High Point, NC. All utilities are in place and the site is immediately available for Build-to-Suit development. Owner will build facility to the firmâs exact specifications and leaseback on mutually agreeable terms.
